title: Czech central bank raises key rate again to tackle inflation
description: Prague, Jun 22 (AP) The Czech Republic's central bank raised its key interest rate significantly Wednesday as it tried to combat soaring inflation. The hike of a percentage point and a quarter brought the interest rate to 7.00%, the highest level since early 1999.It was the ninth straight increase s...

title: Czech Central Bank Dips Into Bitcoin With $1M ‘Test Portfolio’ – A Shift in Strategy?
description:
The Czech National Bank (CNB) has purchased Bitcoin and other digital assets worth $1 million, calling it a “test portfolio,” its first direct exposure to cryptocurrencies.

The move, announced on Thursday, marks a cautious step toward understanding how blockchain-based assets could fit into future ...

title: Czech Central Bank Becomes First Central Bank to Buy Bitcoin
description:
It's another milestone for Bitcoin (BTC), which apparently for the first time has arrived on a central bank balance sheet.

The Czech National Bank (CNB) on Thursday announced the creation of a $1 million test portfolio that includes bitcoin, a USD stablecoin, and a tokenized deposit.

Approved by t...

title: Czech Republic Buys Bitcoin, But Not For a Reserve
description:
The Czech National Bank (CNB) has entered the digital asset market for the first time on Thursday, allocating $1 million to build a blockchain-based pilot portfolio. This acquisition was conducted separately from the bank’s official international reserves.

The CNB emphasized that it has no intentio...

title: Czech Republic: Are arms, not cars, the new economic engine?
description:
Arms as new economic engine?

Growth factor Ukraine war





The Czech Republic has become the country with the highest per capita production of cars in the world over the last thirty years. 2024 was a record year with more than 1.4 million manufactured vehicles in the country of 10 million inhabi...

title: Czech car production falls 4.1% in 2021, return to growth possible in 2022
description: Registrations of new passenger cars in the EU slid by 2.4 percent in 2021, to 9.7 million vehicles, the worst performance since statistics began in 1990, according to data from the European Automobile Manufacturers Association (ACEA).

title: Czech election winner Babis says his party will sign coalition agreement on Nov 3
description:
(Reuters) -Czech election winner Andrej Babis said on Wednesday that his ANO party will sign a coalition agreement with the eurosceptic Motorists party and the far-right, anti-European Union and anti-NATO SPD party on November 3.

"We have an agreed coalition agreement. We agreed to sign it on Monda...

title: Incoming Czech government signals reversal on EU climate and migration policies
description:
PRAGUE – Czechia is set to be governed by a three-party coalition of populist ANO, right-wing Motorists and far-right SPD – a line-up that, in EU shorthand, brings together members of the Patriots and European Sovereignists networks.

Led by former Prime Minister Andrej Babiš, whose ANO party won la...

title: Czech president tasks billionaire ex-premier with forming new government
description:
The Czech president on Monday tasked billionaire ex-premier Andrej Babis, whose party won a parliamentary election earlier this month, to lead talks to form the country’s next government.

The ANO party of self-described “Trumpist” Babis topped the October 3-4 poll, gaining 34.5% of the vote and 80 ...

title: Czech government OKs bill for 2 per cent GDP spending on military
description: Prague, Jan 4 (AP) The Czech government on Wednesday approved a bill aimed at bringing defense spending at the required NATO goal of 2 per cent of gross domestic product as Russia's war in Ukraine continues. Defence Minister Jana Cernochova said the move would "ensure a stable and transparent financ...

title: Czech 2026 budget stalled as incoming government rejects draft plan
description:
+ ↺ − 16 px

The likely next Czech government rejected the outgoing administration’s draft 2026 budget on Monday, raising the possibility of a delayed approval and a higher-than-expected deficit.

Czech billionaire Andrej Babis’ populist ANO party, which won October’s election and is leading coaliti...

title: Reducing inflation the Czech way
description:
By Amol Agrawal,

title: Inflation protests across Europe threaten political turmoil
description:

title: CEE MARKETS 2-Currencies weaker, Czech crown drops after inflation data
description: (Adds Hungary cbank, updates prices) * Czech CPI fell more than expected, intervention fears loom * Hungarian cbank minutes show room for further rate cuts BUDAPEST/BUCHAREST, Oct 9 (Reuters) - The Czech crown led losses among emerging European currencies on Wednesday after lower-than-expected infla...

title: Zomato's Czech Subsidiary Initiates Liquidation
description:
Zomato’s stock gained nearly 1% during morning trade on September 4 following an announcement about its step-down subsidiary’s liquidation. The food aggregator revealed on September 1 that its subsidiary in the Czech Republic, Lunchtime.Cz, had initiated the liquidation process.

Zomato clarified th...

title: Barentz buys specialty ingredients distributor ACE Trade in Czech Republic
description: Barentz International, a leading global life science ingredients distributor, acquired ACE Trade CZ, a distributor of specialty ingredients for the personal care, homecare and industrial markets. The company has over 24 years of experience in the specialty ingredients sector and is well known for th...
